untld_dreams_section_1: Dreams represent the beginning of everything, a path to realization. What makes us hope for the future is precisely the human capacity to imagine, to dream. And how good it is to be able to dream.
untld_dreams_section_2: Portobello takes advantage of this ability to suggest innovations. In these new times, the collective purpose reigns. After all, we are part of and responsible for the whole. From the collective dream, everything changes and transforms, including the beauty of the world.
slabs_section_1: Coatings are no longer on plates, but continuous surfaces.
slabs_section_3: Multisurfaces that are the result of a mixture of technique, art and design. Designing large surfaces for architecture requires a watchful eye. Only then will it be possible to create the future that we want.
slabs_section_7: Slabs, reinvented ceramics revolutionizes the world of architecture.
catalogues_section2: Browse product catalogs, search for images and find inspiration.
a_portobello_section_1: Portobello serves countries on five continents with long-term commercial operations and its brand is recognized for its design and innovation positioning among its main customers, occupying a leading global position in the coatings sector.
a_portobello_section_2: With four decades of history, Portobello is guided by innovative initiatives that have marked its trajectory and helped it reach the level of one of the largest companies in Brazil and Latin America.
Acesso_section1: Track status, view order details and history.
Acesso_section2: See detailed information on shipments and download necessary documentation
Acesso_section3: Consult the financial summary of your account, track financial securities due, overdue and paid.
Acesso_section4: Consult the available stock of the products in the portfolio.
sustenta_section_1: With an integrated vision of sustainability, considering the environmental, social and economic pillars, Portobello has a conscious and regenerative production process and works constantly expanding this perspective for its distribution, with the ambition of implementing good practices and inspiring the entire chain towards an increasingly sustainable future
sustenta_section_4: For Portobello, sustainability means being aware of our actions, the impacts of our choices and understanding the responsibility of being an integral part of society and the ecosystem in which we live.
design_section_7: Design from outside in, and from the inside out.
Crença_section_2: Life with design is smarter, more beautiful and safer.
Visao_section_2: To be a Brazilian leader and global protagonist in coating solutions for environments, through design and innovation.
linha_section_1: The construction of the Portobello America factory in the state of Tennessee, United States, is initiated. * iF Design Awards 2022, the Oscar of Design in the Product category for Cobogó Mundaú.
linha_section_2: Launch of the UNLTD Collection with slabs that expand the possibilities of sustainable architecture.
linha_section_3: Launch of the Slabs Project (Projeto Lastras).
linha_section_4: Launch of Portobello America, in the United States. Adherence to the UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) Movement.
linha_section_5: Launch of Officina Portobello, manufacturing furniture with sustainable material.
linha_section_6: First Standard Store with Green Building Leed certification.
linha_section_7: Establishment of Portobello Group (Portobello Grupo) and launch of the Pointer brand, with democratic design. Start of operations of the new factory in the Northeast, in Marechal Deodoro Alagoas, the most sustainable ceramics factory in Latin America.
linha_section_8: Portobello becomes the largest ceramic coating company in Latin America.
linha_section_9: Adhesion to the New Bovespa Market (Novo Mercado Bovespa). Expansion of the Industrial Park and consolidation of the Portobello Shop Store Network with 100 stores.
linha_section_10: Implementation of the use of natural gas in factories, a source of clean energy for ovens and dryers.
linha_section_11: Launch of the Portobello Shop Franchise Network.
linha_section_12: Implementation of the first oven to use heat recovery technology.
linha_section_13: Construction of the new Industrial Effluent Treatment Station and the implementation of the closed water circuit.
linha_section_15: Start of outsourcing to bring the newest ceramic typology to Brazil, porcelain tiles imported from Italy.
linha_section_16: Expansion of the industrial park, reaching the milestone of 1 million m²/month.
linha_section_17: Innovation in the product with the launch of the 1st line of floors designed for high traffic, the Carga Pesada (Heavy Load) line.
linha_section_19: Start of activities in Tijucas, Santa Catarina, Brazil.
